Name: Gin & IT (Rosolio recipe)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of 3 Fragata Green Olives on stick.
Review: Bitter orange peel is a botanical which features in many gins, and in this cocktail a bitter sweet bergamot liqueur is mixed with gin to good effect.
History: One of the cocktails promoted with the launch of Italicus Rosolio di Bergamotto in the summer of 2017.
